file_content.text: They're going to have to rename Dynamet General after this. I'm thinking "Rakghoul Central."
The trap is set. The Republic kolto tanks are swimming with the rakghoul virus.
Yes! Once the hospital opens its doors, they'll be in a world of trouble.
By the time they realize the kolto is contaminated, it'll be too late.
Oh, I do love a good ploy. Good work.
Whatever you do, don't drop that vial. It would be bad.
Oh, oh!
My lord, have I got a scheme for you!
You give me thirty seconds, and I'll let you in on a scheme that'll knock your socks off!
It's brilliant! Spectacious! A surefire way to hit the Republic right where it hurts: their wounded.
I'll decide if it's brilliant. Now speak.
This had better be good.
You won't be disappointed, my lord.
Underhanded, exploitative.... You're off to a promising start.
So far, so good.
Thank you, my lord.
Get to the point.
Talk faster.
I thought you'd be interested.
I've heard my fair share of "brilliant" plans. I'm rarely impressed.
Call me skeptical.
Trust me, this one's a winner.
Did you just make up a word?
"Spectacious"?
Possibly. I do that.
That's low.
Hey, if I can't menace some defenseless Republic soldiers, then what's it all for?
Our intel suggests the Republic is planning to renovate the old hospital. Most of the medical equipment is still intact, including the kolto tanks.
I say we contaminate those vats, slip a little something extra inside. Care to guess what that "something" might be?
I'm guessing... the rakghoul virus?
I think I know.
Bull's-eye!
Get to the point!
Rakghouls! We're going to taint that pure, precious kolto with the rakghoul virus.
Beats me.
Would you believe... the rakghoul virus?
Just imagine it! All those patients, infected, tearing the hospital staff to pieces.
The Republic will have a full-blown infestation on their hands. So, what do you think?
I like it.
I thank you, I thank you.
I guess so.
Now, the old hospital has been abandoned for years, so there's no telling what's inside. Be careful.
Here's the virus. I'd recommend putting the vial someplace safe.
It's stupid. [Refuse quest]
But... the kolto... rakghouls....
I'm on the verge of an epiphany here. I can feel it.
